short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for radio transmitters.
description: The delivery is requested at CFSD Montreal by May 1st, 2023.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Beacon Set, Radio

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: PW-23-01026597
* Solicitation Number: W8485-237547/A
* Publication Date: February 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 4, 2023, at 14:00:00

## Tender Opportunity

The Department of National Defence invites interested suppliers to bid on a request for proposal for Beacon Set, Radio. This tender is open to all eligible suppliers and is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

## Item Description

* GSIN: 5820 - Radio Transmitters, VHF FM, Mobile
* Quantity: 70
* Unit of Issue: EA
* Delivery Location: CFSD Montreal
* Estimated Delivery Date: Before May 1, 2023

## Bid Requirements

* Suppliers must submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.
* The bid solicitation document must be completed in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and NCAGE.

## Contact Information

* Danny Lebel, Contracting Officer
* Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: Not provided
* Fax: Not provided

## Documents

* Solicitation documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buyer website.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Important Notes

* Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff may be available at the specified bid receiving unit.
* Suppliers are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically.
